tasks.name: Research Microeconomics & Applications
tasks.description: Thoroughly research the definition of microeconomics, its core principles, and various real-world applications to ensure comprehensive understanding for the video content.

tasks.name: Develop Video Script
tasks.description: Create a concise and engaging script for the 3-minute video, specifically focusing on introducing general economic concepts, defining microeconomics, and highlighting its applications clearly.

tasks.name: Prepare Visual Aids/Demo Content
tasks.description: Design or gather any necessary visuals, simple diagrams, or relevant examples that will be incorporated into the video demo to illustrate microeconomic concepts effectively.

tasks.name: Record Video Demonstration
tasks.description: Record the 3-minute video, ensuring clear audio and visuals, practicing the delivery to meet the time constraint while maintaining clarity and enthusiasm.

tasks.name: Edit and Finalize Video
tasks.description: Edit the recorded footage, add any introductory/outro elements, graphics, and ensure the video flows smoothly, meets the time limit, and effectively conveys the required information.
